title: Gym Membership Information
transcript: Welcome to FitLife Gym. We offer three membership options. The basic membership costs thirty dollars per month and includes access to all exercise equipment and the swimming pool. The premium membership is fifty dollars monthly and adds group fitness classes and personal training sessions. Our family package is eighty dollars per month for up to four family members. All memberships require a one-time joining fee of twenty-five dollars. The gym is open twenty-four hours on weekdays and from 6 AM to 10 PM on weekends.

questions.question: How much does the basic membership cost?
The premium membership includes group classes and ______ training.
The family package is for up to three people.
What does the basic membership include?
The gym is open 24 hours every day.
Weekend hours are from ______ AM to 10 PM.
How much does the family package cost per month?
Premium membership is more expensive than the family package.
